outcome: Discovery of internal sabotage led by a rogue administrator plotting to seize control.

events.description: Footage is uncovered showing a trusted system administrator altering core BCI algorithms under Halden's credentials.
Council's forensic team identifies the administrator as Ivan Koval, who has since gone missing.
A coded message from Koval is leaked, suggesting he was coerced by an internal faction.
Authorities issue a public warrant for Koval, framing the incident as an isolated sabotage by a rogue agent.
